title: Medical Supplies
description: Provide essential medical supplies to children in need for their health and well_being.

title: Scholarships for Students
description: Support underprivileged students by offering scholarships to help them access quality education.

title: Used Clothing Drive
description: Whether you’re moving, reorganizing the house, have kids that grew out of their clothes or you’re just spring cleaning…have you ever considered donating those items to the Purple Heart Foundation? We’ll take them!

title: Clean Water
description: Ensure clean and safe drinking water for communities facing water scarcity.

title: Clothing Donation
description: When you donate your new and gently used items to the Purple Heart Foundation, local thrift shops sell them in their stores and donate the revenue back to the Purple Heart Foundation so we may provide valuable services and resources for veterans across the country.

title: Better Food
description: Currently, millions of children around the world are growing up in the midst of a deadly epidemic. Save the Children is there to protect children all over the world on the frontlines, but only with the support of donors like you.

title: Digital Learning Initiative
description: Promote digital learning and education for students in underserved communities.

title: Support for Cancer Patients
description: Provide support and care for cancer patients during their treatment journey.

title: Emergency Medical Relief
description: Offer emergency medical relief to communities affected by disasters and crises.

title: Used Clothing Drive
description: Whether you’re moving, reorganizing the house, have kids that grew out of their clothes or you’re just spring cleaning…have you ever considered donating those items to the Purple Heart Foundation? We’ll take them!

title: Better Food for Everyone
description: Save the Children is there to protect children all over the world on the frontlines, but only with the support of donors like you. If you live in Houston and want to help others, check out our donation center in Houston.

title: Free Teaching
description: Promote digital learning and education for students in underserved communities.
